name: Delta Squared 64: The Square Nebula
description:
After getting tired of 2D gamedev lately, I've decided to embrace the early 3D era vibes and make a game out of it. I'm still working on it. Expect the final game to release this year.

I'm open to feedback! If anything just post in comments and I'll see what I can do about the issue.

I'll be still working on this project the next few months! Expect more stages and bosses in the final game! Maybe even more modes!

Credits:

Programming, Art, OST, Sfx, 3D modelling, VA, and Game made by me.
